name: 邱弘緯
objective:
未來的自然語言處理技術應該是能讓機器以人為本的角度來了解人類語言。尤其人類是富有感情的，所以，機器必須能理解與應對人類的情感。

本課程內容將從心理語言學出發，探討、比較人和機器如何處理語言。尤其是人如何透過文字和語音來表達不同情緒，然後運用機器學習、深度學習和人本資料資料探勘等技術，進行語音與文本分析，偵測辨識實際人類語言中的情緒，進而培養如何讓人工智慧能夠更貼近使用者需要的洞察力與處理能力。
In future natural language processing technologies, machines should understand language from a human-oriented perspective. Especially given that human beings have emotions, machines must be able to understand and respond to human emotions.
The content of this course will be based on psycholinguistics. We will first explore and compare how people and machines deal with language, especially in terms of how people express different emotions through words and voices. We will then apply machine learning, deep learning and human-centered information data mining techniques to detect emotions in real human language.
